TopicTitle: Off kilter kerbal name text (might be a Steam related glitch)

Articles.Content:
I noticed this soon after starting up KSP 1.0. I've actually seen this happen before in 0.90 and I think it may actually be a steam glitch (a friend of mine had the same thing happen in Civilization V).

It's just the text of the kerbals names, everything else is fine.

KSP 1.0

Windows 8.1 64x

Edit: A restart of KSP fixed it up. Or maybe a clear of the save, not sure which one did it, probably restart.

[![screenshot2_zpskb2prkyj.png](http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v214/smjjames/screenshot2_zpskb2prkyj.png)](http://smg.photobucket.com/user/smjjames/media/screenshot2_zpskb2prkyj.png.html)
